column4: Got a GRUB 15 error after install and can't boot. advice is to edit the /boot/grub/menu.lst file, but there is no such file in my boot/grub folder
It sounds like you don't even have a filesystem to boot to...you can use a liveCD to see if your filesystem has been destroyed, or you can just do a fresh install
nope I've got a boot partition and GRUB folder, just not that specific file.
Okay, maybe someone else can help, sorry but I'm here just trying to gather knowledge mostly
